= Introduction =

Steps to get ready to work with simply ticket:<BR>

1) put the db into your mysql server....take the .sql file from svn<BR>
2) download all the source code<BR>
3) compile, create stub for Controller*Impl and publish them the way you like the most...copy them in the client's directory or put them on a web server accessible from the client<BR>

Now you have a working project on which you can work...gl<BR>
